text:
Visited the clinic for the first time, Dr Yvonne is very nice and explained in details. Even tell the next Cust sorry for the long waiting time.
Very humble and friendly doc. They accept booking online which is good that patients don’t have to wait too long.
Dr Alex is very caring and welcomes every patient to his care. I have been visiting the clinic since it just started. I have been well taken care of, I have definite trust in his team.

Dr Alex and Dr Yvonne are both very caring doctors who will take the time to explain my medical illnesses.

Dr Alex has treated me with much patience and kindness especially with my complex medical conditions. Wait time might be long but I felt as a patient whose doctor takes the time to listen to my concerns and explain my treatment options, it is worth the wait.

The staff are also very helpful and kind. A very positive experience and homely feel whenever I visit this place. Will definitely recommend people to this clinic!

I have visited this clinic many times when I was unwell, the clinic assistants are always kind, welcoming, and ready to assist whenever needed.

The doctors—Dr. Alex, Dr. Lai, and Dr. Yvonne—are highly experienced, professional, and attentive. They take the time to listen and offer valuable advice. Love how they treat patients as well! Overall, this is an excellent clinic that provides a good service/positive and homely experience every time I visit it. I would definitely recommend this clinic to others and I strongly disagree with any negative reviews. ☺️

The doctor and staffs here are very friendly, pleasant and knowledgeable. Dr Alex is a very patience, pleasant and caring doctor whom will always do his best to explain in detailed. My husband & i have been visiting this clinic since day 1. They are our family doctor as well which knows our medical condition. This clinic gives a homely & warmth feel. Highly recommended this clinic!!!
